content: the old-time favorite this dishcloth pattern is my version of the popular bias knit pattern i altered the start and end a bit to even up the corners perfect for a first project supplies 1 ball of worsted weight cotton it will make at least 2 or 3 cloths size 7 needles k = knit yo = yarn over k2t = knit 2 stitches together as one bobble = bind off cast on 5 stitches k three row k 2 yo k to end repeat last row until you have 45 stitches or until desired size k 1 k2t yo k2t k to end repeat last row until you have 5 stitches remaining k two row bobble and tuck ends my dish cloth measures 7-1/2 square gauge is not important for this project but you can certainly use a larger or smaller needle size if you like thanks for downloading a bunchberry studio pattern more knitting patterns will be available soon you are welcome to email me if you have any questions or concerns bunchberrystudio@hotmail com ©sylvia b lewis 2012
